mapper.update: update be_role_menu set sys005='0' where role_id=#{roleId}
mapper.select: select * from be_role_menu where role_id=#{roleId} and sys005='1'

select t.*, r.code roleCode ,m.url menuPermissions ,m.menu_type menuType from be_role_menu t left join be_role r on t.role_id=r.id left join be_menu m on t.menu_id=m.id where t.sys005 = 1 and t.role_id in
#{role}
